title: The Bloody Chamber and Other Stories
description: Shares ISBN 9780140128376 with this edition. Published after 1992, different cover art.From familiar fairy tales and legends--Little Red Riding Hood, Bluebeard, Puss-in-Boots, Beauty and the Beast, vampires, and werewolves--Angela Carter has created an absorbing collection of dark, sensual, fantastic stories.
author: Angela Carter
